tool_description: Validates document format compatibility and structure for digital signing processes, checking file integrity and supported formats.

document_path.description: File path to the document to be validated

expected_format.description: Expected document format (PDF, DOCX, XML, etc.)

error_messages: File not found: The specified document_path does not exist or is not accessible.
Unsupported format: The document format is not supported for digital signing operations.
Corrupted file: The document file appears to be corrupted or incomplete.
Empty document: The document contains no content or has zero file size.
usage: Provide document_path to validate format compatibility. Optionally specify expected_format for stricter validation. Returns validation status and format details.

is_valid.description: Whether the document format is valid for signing
